text: António Reginaldo Matias de Araújo (2 October 1977 - 11 January 2016) was a Brazilian footballer. He played as a defender. He played for Coritiba, São Paulo, Santos, Flamengo, Santa Cruz and Criciúma. He was born in Presidente Prudente, São Paulo. Araújo died from a heart attack on 11 January 2016 in Cornélio Procópio, Paraná. He was 38. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state) Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Brazil
title: Reginaldo Araújo
